main.screencontrollers

Class EventsManagementScreenController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.screencontrollers.ScreenController
      • main.screencontrollers.EventsManagementScreenController
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class EventsManagementScreenController
extends ScreenController
    The EventsManagementScreenController handles events information and management: create and cancel an event; organize the speaker and room; as well as get events info
    Since:
    2020-11-11
    Version:
    3.6
    Author:
    Haoze Huang
